statements: SELECT * FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, insurance_provider FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE policy_start_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT policy_number FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE vehicle_make = 'Ford' AND policy_start_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_model, policy_number FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE policy_end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE vehicle_make = 'Honda' ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails GROUP BY vehicle_make HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, insurance_provider, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE insurance_provider = 'Geico' ORDER BY policy_end_date;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT MAX(vehicle_id) AS max_vehicle_id, MIN(vehicle_id) AS min_vehicle_id FROM VehicleInsuranceDetails;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_insurance;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, insurance_company FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_make, insurance_company, insurance_policy_number FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM claim_history ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE insurance_company = 'ABC Insurance'
SELECT insurance_policy_number, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota'
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, COUNT(*) as total_claims FROM vehicle_insurance JOIN claim_history ON vehicle_insurance.vehicle_id = claim_history.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_make, vehicle_model
SELECT claim_date, claim_description FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, insurance_policy_number FROM vehicle_insurance WHERE vehicle_model LIKE '%SUV%'
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo;
SELECT policy_number, vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM VehicleInfo WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM ClaimHistory WHERE status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT insurer_name, start_date, end_date FROM InsuranceDetails WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_make, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM VehicleInfo GROUP BY vehicle_make;
SELECT * FROM VehicleInfo
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM VehicleInfo WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT insurer_name, end_date FROM InsuranceDetails ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT policy_number, MAX(premium_amount) AS max_premium FROM InsuranceDetails GROUP BY policy_number HAVING COUNT(policy_number) >= 2
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM ClaimHistory WHERE status = 'Approved'
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicle_details;
SELECT policy_number, policy_type FROM policy_details ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_description FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM claim_documents WHERE document_type = 'Photo' LIMIT 3;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_year, insurance_company FROM vehicle_details INNER JOIN policy_details ON vehicle_details.vehicle_id = policy_details.vehicle_id ORDER BY vehicle_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC, vehicle_make ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT policy_number, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policy_details WHERE policy_type IN ('Comprehensive', 'Collision') AND policy_start_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claim_history WHERE claim_amount > 10000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, insurance_company FROM vehicle_details JOIN policy_details ON vehicle_details.vehicle_id = policy_details.vehicle_id WHERE policy_type = 'Liability';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description, document_url FROM claim_history JOIN claim_documents ON claim_history.claim_id = claim_documents.claim_id WHERE claim_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_model_year DESC;
SELECT policy_number, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_model_year > 2015;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM insurance_policies WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, status, decision_date FROM claim_history WHERE status = 'Approved';
